selfTaught.title: SELF-TAUGHT
selfTaught.text: I have learned most of the things you'll see here while studying through open source materials in my free time.

detailOriented.title: DETAIL-ORIENTED
detailOriented.text: I put much effort into deploying high-quality applications and understand that little details can make a huge difference.

problemSolver.title: PROBLEM SOLVER
problemSolver.text: I believe just getting things to work is not good enough. I strive to find clean and maintainable solutions to problems.

fancybook.subtitle: A full-stack social network app.
features: User authentication via Email, Google, Twitter, GitHub.
Customizable user profile page with CDN image uploading.

contact.title: Contact
contact.name: Name
contact.successMessage: I will get back to you ASAP!
